item.title: Michelle add a quote by Hakim Sanai
item.description: "This too shall pass." -- Hakim Sanai

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Barbara Chase-Riboud
item.description: "too much love like too much rain begets large and bloody pools of discontent. I see my winter marked in your eyes. Whoever told you I was perfection?'-exerpt from Valide" -- Barbara Chase-Riboud

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Bob Hope
item.description: "I have seen what a laugh can do. It can transform almost unbearable tears into something bearable, even hopeful." -- Bob Hope

item.title: Michelle add a quote by George Sand
item.description: "Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness." -- George Sand

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Bono
item.description: "Sometimes religion gets in the way of God." -- Bono

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Cultivate your curves - they may be dangerous but they won't be avoided." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "It's not the men in your life that matters, it's the life in your men." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Keep a diary and one day it'll keep you." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "I love quotations because it is a joy to find thoughts one might have, beautifully expressed with much authority by someone recognized wiser than oneself." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Gene Kelly
item.description: "Dignity, always Dignity!" -- Gene Kelly

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "I've been accused of vulgarity. I say that's bullshit." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "The only thing we don't have a god for is premature ejaculation... but I hear that it's coming quickly." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs." -- Robin Williams

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "You're only given a spark of madness. You musn't lose it." -- Robin Williams

item.title: Michelle add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Michelle add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare
